Package org.apache.commons.vfs.provider.local

The Local File Provider.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DefaultLocalFileProvider A file system provider, which uses direct file access.
GenericFileNameParser A general-purpose file name parser.
LocalFile A file object implementation which uses direct file access.
LocalFileName A local file URI.
LocalFileNameParser A name parser.
LocalFileSystem A local file system.
WindowsFileName A local file URI.
WindowsFileNameParser A parser for Windows file names.
 

Package org.apache.commons.vfs.provider.local Description

The Local File Provider.
